long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fantastic Flowza Animating Clock is just a click away on your Chrome Browser.

Although this is absolutely nothing like owning the real thing, the display and animation are as close to the physical clock as possible!

Select from one of 3 faces:
Upon Us - Inspired by the bard himself, this face uses Shakespearean languge with the letters T-I-C-K animating in the corners.

Exactly - Contemporary and concise, this is the clock for those who say it as it is.  Features an animating light pendulum.

Bang On - Classic British expressions that are frequently used to say the time out loud,  The words Tick and Tock animate along the top.

Find out how to get your own USB powered Flowza clock to hang on your wall or sit on your desk at www.flowza-clocks.com
